Description: Based on your experience and knowledge, MIFID requires that we consider whether complex products we offer are appropriate for you.
Name: MiFID II Appropriateness Test - Version 5

QuestionOptions.Text: A professional qualifications relevant to the understanding of complex products

Questions.QuestionText: Education
Have you worked for more than three years in a position requiring knowledge of complex* financial investments?
